meanings.definition: Not knowing or being aware of something.
meanings.sent1: The unwist child wandered aimlessly in the park.
meanings.sent2: She felt unwist about the surprise party waiting for her.
meanings.sent3: The unwist puppy kept chasing its own tail.
meanings.sent4: His unwist behavior led to many misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The unwist student missed the important announcement.

meanings.sent1: I unwist the answer to the riddle.
meanings.sent2: She unwist the danger lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent3: The cat unwist the mouse hiding behind the couch.
meanings.sent4: He unwist the consequences of his actions too late.
meanings.sent5: They unwist the treasure buried beneath the old oak tree.

meanings.sent1: He unwist the latest gossip in town.
meanings.sent2: She unwist the location of the hidden key.
meanings.sent3: The detective unwist the identity of the mysterious caller.
meanings.sent4: Their unwist decision led to a series of mishaps.
